name: Pillar (itch) (Black Bucket Games)
description:
Solve puzzles and evade danger in PILLAR. Reach the chrysalis and metamorphize. A Caterpillar cannot fight. A Caterpillar cannot hide. A Caterpillar can run. And a Butterfly can fly.

Short puzzle game I created because I was bored. I also need to start actually finishing games instead of just working on them for a month and then dropping them. Would appreciate a download + feedback.

Try not to get too mad.

WASD to move Up Down Left Right

Space to Select

R to Reset

Esc to Return to Menu or Quit
